titleStmt.title: Church reformation, a discourse pointing at some vanities in divine service. Delivered in two sermons at Bridgnorth: Sept. 30. 1660. Being the Lords Day; and the time of the assizes held there for the county of Salop. By Mich: Thomas, rector of Stockton in the same county.
titleStmt.author: Thomas, Michael, rector of Stockton.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Jo: Martin, Ja: Allestry, and Tho: Dicas, and are to be sold at the Bell in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
